mapper.select: select * from RECOMMENDATION where DELETED = 0 order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into RECOMMENDATION (ID, USER_ID, CATEGORY, STORE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, TOTAL_TIME, PRICE_PER_PERSON, IS_RESERVATION, DELETED) values (RECOMMENDATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{category}, #{storeName}, #{description}, #{totalTime}, #{pricePerPerson}, #{isReservation}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from RECOMMENDATION where id = #{id} and DELETED = 0
mapper.update: update RECOMMENDATION set USER_ID = #{userId}, CATEGORY = #{category}, STORE_NAME = #{storeName}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, TOTAL_TIME = #{totalTime}, PRICE_PER_PERSON = #{pricePerPerson}, IS_RESERVATION = #{isReservation} where id = #{id} and DELETED = 0
update RECOMMENDATION set DELETED = 1, DELETED_AT = SYSTIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
